price: t’i ndërrojmë ata me njerëz më të mirë se ata dhe askush nuk na pengon dot.
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila khayran min'hum wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
